broadcastConnections.title: Broadcast Connections Option
broadcastConnections.description: Whether a message should be sent to all clients when a new client connects or disconnects

allowReconnecting.title: Allow Reconnecting Option
allowReconnecting.description: Whether a client can reconnect using the secret

privateRoom.title: Private Room Option
privateRoom.description: Whether a room has a user provided password that must be proivided by a client when connecting

roomSize.title: Max Room Size Option
roomSize.description: How many clients should the room allow

allowClientToClient.title: Allow Client to Client Option
allowClientToClient.description: Whether a room allows clients to send messages directly to other clients
